item.description:
Real Art Ways Creative Cocktail Hour with opening reception of "Art and the Net."

For those of you who have never been there...the Loading Dock Lounge offers a comfortable place to meet a great mix of people and have your favorite beverage. They hold a cocktail hour every third Thursday of the month from 6 - 9 pm. You can see a movie or an art exhibit, too.

Cover charge of $8.00/free to RAW members. Munchies provided. Cash bar.

Get there early, the place fills up quickly! Plenty of free parking!

Directions: From either I84 W or E take exit 46- Sisson Ave. At end on long exit ramp, turn left at the lite, onto Sisson Ave. Very quickly you come to another lite (Capitol Ave); turn left. Your third right is Arbor St. Turn right onto Arbor St; you'll immediately see a large sign (RAW) on the left. Turn into the driveway at the sign, and proceed all the way to the back of the building. Enter at the back of the building.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Creative Cocktail Hour at Real Art Ways
